alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 12:13AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Leavenworth, southeastern Atchison and Platte Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms northwest of Leavenworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Leavenworth, Lansing, Platte City, Weatherby Lake, Weston, Camden Point, Ferrelview, Easton, Tracy, Farley, Ridgely, Fort Leavenworth, Stillings, Beverly, Kansas City Intl Arpt, Hoover, East Leavenworth, Lowemont and Potter. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 8 and 26. Interstate 435 between mile markers 24 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
